Package model

Class CoffeeTruck

java.lang.Object
model.CoffeeTruck
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegularCoffeeTruck
public class CoffeeTruck extends Object
Represents a coffee truck with a specific location, type, inventory, and recipe handler.
